item.title: Gap Is Expanding in the Beauty and Accessory Space
item.description: Gap Inc. is expanding into beauty and accessories in an effort to rebuild into consistent growth across its core brands such as Gap, Banana Republic, and Old Navy. Richard Dickson, Gap Inc. CEO, says
